modules.title: Hand Hygiene Basics
modules.description: Learn proper handwashing techniques and importance
modules.content: Proper handwashing is one of the most effective ways to prevent disease transmission. Wash hands for at least 20 seconds with soap and clean water.
keyPoints: Wash hands for at least 20 seconds
Use soap and clean running water
Wash before eating and after using toilet

modules.title: Safe Water Storage
modules.description: Best practices for storing drinking water safely
modules.content: Proper water storage prevents contamination and ensures safe drinking water. Use covered containers and clean them regularly.
keyPoints: Keep water in cool, dark place
Don't store water in metal containers

modules.title: Toilet Hygiene
modules.description: Maintaining clean and safe toilet facilities
modules.content: Clean toilets prevent the spread of diseases and ensure a healthy environment. Regular cleaning and proper ventilation are essential.

modules.title: Kitchen Sanitation
modules.description: Food safety and kitchen hygiene practices
modules.content: Kitchen sanitation prevents foodborne illnesses. Keep surfaces clean, store food properly, and maintain good personal hygiene while cooking.
keyPoints: Clean surfaces before and after cooking

modules.title: Waste Management
modules.content: Proper waste management prevents contamination of water sources and reduces health risks. Separate, store, and dispose of waste correctly.
keyPoints: Don't dump waste in water bodies

modules.title: Personal Hygiene
modules.content: Personal hygiene maintains health and prevents disease. Regular bathing, dental care, and clean clothes are essential.

modules.title: Water Treatment
modules.description: Methods to purify water for drinking
modules.content: Water treatment ensures safe drinking water. Boiling, filtration, and chemical treatment are common methods to purify water.
keyPoints: Boil water for at least 1 minute

modules.title: Community Sanitation
modules.content: Community sanitation requires collective effort. Keep public spaces clean, maintain drainage systems, and promote hygiene awareness.
